content: SP-H core bit Premium core bit for coring in all types of concrete – for ≥2.5 kW tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Equidist technology (1 3/8 diameter and above) – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance Constant high drilling speed over the entire life of the core bit Designed for the most challenging conditions, the core bit excels in concrete with a high rebar content Diamond core bit without the Hilti X-Change module system Applications BL quick-release connection end for high power Hilti diamond drilling tools (more than 2.5 kW), Hilti BL shank BS (1-¼) universal connection end for Hilti and competition diamond drilling tools Rig-based wet coring in all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Base materials: Concrete Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | Yes | Connection end | BS (1-1/4 in), BL (Hilti) | Working length | 16 in | Segment height | 10 mm ### ITEMS- 3798506 -
